        public abstract boolean canMove(Pieces[][] board,
                                int r,
                                int c)
        canMove returns whether a piece can move to the proposed position.
        Parameters:
        board - This is a 2D array of Pieces and the current board.
        r - This is the proposed row.
        c - This is the proposed column.
        Returns:
        booelan weather the piece can move to the proposed location.
